metadata.synopsis: Dialog with Devella when you save her from Dolor at Figaro's.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Devella will speak to you when she got up after defeating Dolor.Devella: S_LOW_Devella_Fountainhead_048defbd-d386-4272-a5b7-40c1a9e75b81Near Figaro: S_LOW_Figaro_3ff2b7ea-3de2-4bdc-a600-c973f290bc09

3.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
3.text: If it had been the dwarf alone, we might have stood a chance, but these doppelgangers... they swarmed us.

90.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
90.text: We were paralysed before we even had the chance to fight back.

238.speaker: Player
238.text: I'm glad I could keep you safe.

189.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
189.text: And I'm glad you're fighting the fight to keep the Dread Lord out of the city.

191.speaker: Player
191.text: Weren't you supposed to be protecting patriars in the Upper City?

241.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
241.text: I was heading that way after we last spoke, when I heard a commotion. I stepped in to see what was going on.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: Those doppelgangers are tracking his progress. Apparently this one's a rising star among Bhaalists.

190.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
190.text: Then perhaps it's a good job I ran into him.

87.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
87.text: Then there's more of these nutters running around... I thought as much.

74.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
74.text: Devella Fountainhead. Constable of the Flaming Fist.

14.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
14.text: I've been investigating the recent spate of murders across the city.
14.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

220.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
220.text: I was on my way to the Upper City when I heard a commotion. I stepped in to see if I could help.
220.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

64.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
64.text: It's not every day you have the chance to catch a killer in action. Not even in this profession.
64.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

257.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
257.text: You, on the other hand, you've probably seen your fair share of murders since you discovered your heritage.
257.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

223.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
223.text: The assailant is dead now. But I overheard some of his plans.

113.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
113.text: We can question the assailant later, once he comes round, but I think I have it now.

255.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
255.text: It offers access to the 'tribunal'. An initiation rite, held by your Father's acolytes, that brings a new cultist into the fold.

246.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
246.text: Perhaps they've even asked you to undertake this gruesome sacrament.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: I have a hand - I plan to infiltrate the tribunal and tear it down from within.

99.speaker: Player
99.text: I must find a hand, so I can infiltrate the tribunal and tear it down from within.

57.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
57.text: You're brave, spawn, to put yourself into the heart of the Hells like that. Braver than us all.

106.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
106.text: But you're just one sword against a god - are you sure you're up to it?

24.speaker: Player
24.text: I can't keep running from Bhaal forever - I must sever his hold, once and for all.

44.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
44.text: It won't be easy, but I'm glad to hear your conviction.

181.speaker: Player
181.text: I am in command. Even Bhaal will bow to me eventually.

207.speaker: Player
207.text: I'm not sure I can be free, but I will do what's right until the end.

6.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
6.text: A word of advice, then, if I may.

94.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
94.text: Infiltrate the cult. Deceive your Father's lackeys. If Bhaal believes he has you, they will let down their guard.

105.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
105.text: There's bound to be one moment where he trips up, and you see a way to stand against him.

46.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
46.text: I don't know what will happen to the Gate if you don't, but I do know that you're damn well the best hope we have.

253.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
253.text: In the meantime, I'm going to Basilisk Gate. I'll try to drum up some support - and warn as many important people as possible. Hope I can yell loud enough.

132.speaker: Player
132.text: When I see you there, Devella, this will all be over.

126.speaker: Player
126.text: Thank you for believing in me.

143.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
143.text: See you around, Bhaalspawn. Stay alive for me, won't you?

72.speaker: Player
72.text: You're not going to join me?

183.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
183.text: I'd love to. To be among the minds of the madmen first-hand... But there's not a chance I'd pass.

122.speaker: Player
122.text: I wish the Fist could do more. You're useless.

140.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
140.text: I deserve that one. Detective-in-distress, and all. But I will keep trying.

254.speaker: Player
254.text: I really don't know if I'm up to it...

97.speaker: Player
97.text: I don't know where 'Candulhallow's Tombstones' is.

93.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
93.text: You have to try to find it and stop the cult. Not for me. For the Baldurians.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: I think they will want to make me leader of their cult very soon.

28.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
28.text: I gravely hope you mean to dismantle it, and this friendship won't end with crossed swords.

159.speaker: Player
159.text: I'm staying away from Bhaal. I never wanted any part in this.

75.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
75.text: Perhaps you will keep your life if you stay away. If you think you can run from Bhaal, I won't blame you.

195.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
195.text: Then I must doubly warn the patriars if he is soon to lash out at them. I'll be in Basilisk Gate if ever you need.

50.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
50.text: These killings aren't random. In fact, they seem to be part of some sort of test.
50.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

177.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
177.text: That document you showed me before - the one with the victims' names on it - that was the briefing.
177.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

92.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
92.text: The killers paralyse their victims, take their hands as an offering for Bhaal, and make it look like the cult of the Absolute was behind it all.
92.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

81.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
81.text: It grants them access to a 'tribunal'. From what I could gather, it's some sort of rite of initiation for aspiring cultists to prove their worth.
81.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

16.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
16.text: And it's taking place beneath 'Candulhallow's Tombstones'.
16.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

61.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
61.text: Like I said before, it's not something I can look into in an official capacity, but you...
61.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

256.speaker: Player
256.text: I have a hand. I'll investigate this tribunal.
256.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

37.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
37.text: How did you...? Perhaps it's best I don't ask. Do what you have to do.

226.speaker: Player
226.text: I suppose I'd better go and find a hand, then.
226.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

235.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
235.text: Technically, I haven't yet done an inventory of this crime scene, so if something were to go 'missing' from a corpse...
235.context: NodeContext: suggestive - she's implying you should loot the corpse of the murderer

152.speaker: Player
152.text: 'Candulhallow's Tombstones' - any idea where that is?

47.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
47.text: It's not a place I'd ever heard of, if I'm honest. But rumour has it there were some hidden cellars somewhere near the Elfsong.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: Sounds like you have a lot to follow up on. I'll leave you to it.

225.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
225.text: I will, but I'm still obliged to protect the Upper City patriars first.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: I'll take a look into it.

151.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
151.text: And I'll pick up where I left off - the Upper City.

110.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
110.text: When I'm done, I'll stop by the Basilisk Gate. If you've got anything to tell of your investigations by then, I'd love to hear it.

150.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
150.text: Now if you don't mind, I need to draft a report to my superiors before I forget it all. But don't worry, I'll be sure to put in a good word for you.
150.context: CinematicNodeContext: Devella takes and studies the murder target list.

128.speaker: Player
128.text: I know that the murders are connected to Bhaal, if that's what you overheard.
128.context: CinematicNodeContext: Devella takes and studies the murder target list.

134.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
134.context: CinematicNodeContext: Devella takes and studies the murder target list.

251.speaker: Player
251.text: Don't panic, but I'm sort of... his spawn.
251.context: CinematicNodeContext: Devella takes and studies the murder target list.

78.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
78.text: Oh! Oh my. By Ilmater's rack, that's... that's...

56.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
56.text: I should arrest you at once, but - well, the Bhaalspawn crisis, it's the most interesting criminal plight in Baldurian history.

79.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
79.text: If what you claim is true, you wouldn't be helping me here unless you were trying to end Bhaal's hold over you.

138.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
138.text: Just like the wayward Bhaalspawn who saved the Gate before...

252.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
252.text: You are here to help me, and not to sacrifice me, aren't you?

243.speaker: Player
243.text: You're very excited about Bhaal for someone who's supposed to be protecting the city.

41.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
41.text: It's my job to be. Though I confess it has been very interesting.

230.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
230.text: You see, these murders have been cropping up all over the city. I've been following their trail for a while now, and tracing it back to its roots.

227.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
227.text: They're always the same - victim paralysed by poison, Absolutist symbol scrawled on the floor in blood. Hand removed pre-mortem.

40.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
40.text: The ritualistic brutality of them... it's extraordinary. And it could only be the work of a Bhaalist.

172.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
172.text: But you've been investigating too, if I'm not mistaken? You're trying to stop your own kind?

163.speaker: Player
163.text: I am working against Bhaal - I got a hold of the list of murder targets.

88.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
88.text: I'm glad you're on the right side of this, Bhaalspawn. You could be invaluable, if you can get on the inside.

107.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
107.text: Hells, you might be the only one who can stop this. What else do you know?

249.speaker: Player
249.text: I was hoping you could tell me more.

118.speaker: Player
118.text: I'm planning to infiltrate the cult, but I don't know where to start.

20.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
20.text: Most of what I know is based on reading into Sarevok's history. I'm sure it's nothing next to your personal experience, but I'll share what I have.

114.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
114.text: A century ago, Bhaal bred dozens just like you. One of whom was Sarevok Anchev.

186.speaker: Player
186.text: Bhaal is trying to force me to be his Chosen. I'm doing all I can to resist him.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: Father has shown me visions - the Temple of Bhaal lurks somewhere in the city.

104.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
104.text: So it's all happening again... just like in Sarevok's time...

174.speaker: Player
174.text: I don't know much. I only just found out I was a Bhaalspawn in a vision.

158.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
158.text: You've had a busy tenday. I can't even imagine. Here's what I know.

215.speaker: Player
215.text: I'm working against Bhaal - I found the murderer's target list.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Tell her of the target list. Say nothing of your intentions.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: Show her the target list. Say nothing of your intentions.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: I am here to sacrifice you, I'm afraid.

139.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
139.text: Ah, hells. I will live to warn the Gate. FISTS!

175.speaker: Player
175.text: You tell me what you know, and I'll tell you what I know.
175.context: CinematicNodeContext: Devella takes and studies the murder target list.

212.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
212.text: There's no way in the hells that those scenes and these murders aren't connected somehow.

204.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
204.text: Now your turn. What do you know about the killings?

211.speaker: Player
211.text: Show her the murder target list.
211.context: CinematicNodeContext: Devella takes and studies the murder target list.

43.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
43.text: Gods... This is it. The proof that I was right!
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Devella takes and studies the murder target list.

247.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
247.text: I've been working on an assignment, see - a research project of sorts. I knew my conclusions were sound, but this... I never expected this.

131.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
131.text: I'll tell you what I know.

18.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
18.text: A century ago, there was a child of the god of murder - Sarevok Anchev.

121.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
121.text: He ruled the Iron Throne - a dark tower hiding a darker secret. It was the front for a deadly arms-dealing network.

210.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
210.text: There, he amassed an army, seeking to become a god himself. Under his stewardship, the Bhaal Temple was revived, and with it, the Bhaal cult itself.

208.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
208.text: Fortunately, the Temple was destroyed, and to cleanse the city of Sarevok's memory, the Iron Throne was torn from its foundations and cast into the Chionthar.

229.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
229.text: For most, that was the end of it. But cults like that don't disappear overnight. This list you brought me confirms I'm right.

33.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
33.text: For most, that was the end of it. But cults like that don't disappear overnight.

31.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
31.text: The Bhaal cult is back, and someone is out there, continuing Sarevok's work.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: Bhaal has a new Chosen in Baldur's Gate - Orin. I suspect she's behind this.

205.speaker: Player
205.text: I think it may be a Bhaalspawn...

17.speaker: Player
17.text: I think it may be another Bhaalspawn...

100.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
100.text: Gods save us all if you're right, but I'd believe it. Whoever it is, they are intimately familiar with Sarevok's work.

115.speaker: Player
115.text: What makes you think it's not Sarevok himself?

127.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
127.text: I've not ruled out the possibility that it is Sarevok himself.

221.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
221.text: The brutality of the killings is certainly reminiscent of his work. But there's something more here, something new...

196.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
196.text: No idea, unfortunately. But whoever it is, they are intimately familiar with Sarevok's work.

119.speaker: Player
119.text: You said Sarevok led the cultists a century ago - he can't still be alive, can he?

55.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
55.text: Stranger things have come back to haunt this city.

167.speaker: Player
167.text: You're not wrong about the cult. I found some Bhaalists in the sewers.

29.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
29.text: No doubt you found a trail of bodies in their wake?

133.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
133.text: The brutality of the killings is on a par with Sarevok's own. But there's something more here, something new...

45.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
45.text: There's a reverence to these murders, a certain flair. It's as if they were done in worship.

176.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
176.text: The precision of the cuts, the depth, the execution - the best butchers in Faerûn couldn't make a cut like that. Trust me, I've asked them.

7.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
7.text: I tried to explain all this to my superiors, but they wouldn't have any of it.

148.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
148.text: They told me to drop it. Told me the city doesn't need another conspiracy theorist and to get back to doing my job before they find someone else to do it for me.

103.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
103.text: But you - you're not bound by such constraints. Help me out, here. Help the city out.

250.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
250.text: Follow the trail of these murders. Prove the truth. Use your lineage to get places the Fist can't.

178.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
178.text: I'll bet if you follow the trail of these murders, you'll be able to unearth the truth of this resurgence.

49.speaker: Player
49.text: I'm going to stop my Father, whatever it takes.

232.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
232.text: If anyone can, it will be you. Or at least that's what the legends say.

21.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
21.text: Believe me, I wish I could. But I need this job.

231.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
231.text: Half the silkroot-chewers in the Gate have claimed to be a Bhaalspawn at one point. The Fist don't listen to ghost stories.

147.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
147.text: You're better off not raising any suspicions. Trust me.

149.speaker: Player
149.text: What will you do in the meantime?

10.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
10.text: Try to convince my superiors to put some resources into this matter.

42.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
42.text: After what's happened here, they might finally take this seriously. Might.

244.speaker: Player
244.text: I'm trying to hide from my Father's wrath. I fear what will happen if I delve too deeply.

111.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
111.text: Then I hope you can at least protect yourself, and pray this plot fails.

15.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
15.text: Meet me at Basilisk Gate if you've anything more to report. And good luck.

146.speaker: Player
146.text: I've got better things to do than investigate a cult.

213.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
213.text: I suppose it was quite an ask... I'll see if I can drum up some support from Basilisk Gate.

58.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
58.text: Meet me there if you have a change of heart.

166.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
166.text: I've done everything I can within the remit of my job. Any more, and they'll fire me.

187.speaker: Player
187.text: Not only is the cult back, it's spreading fast. I ran into some Bhaalists in the park.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: You should raise this with your superiors, immediately.

82.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
82.text: Don't you think I've tried? They won't listen.

224.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
224.text: You're lucky you met me - most of the Fist wouldn't have believed you were a Bhaalspawn. Think it's Baldurian superstition.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Tell her about the murder target list you found.

217.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
217.text: Gods - that's it! Proof that I was right.

112.speaker: Player
112.text: I killed Bhaal's second favourite child, Orin.

202.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
202.text: So the Bhaalists had a new leader, and you killed them...

117.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
117.text: This is excellent news. Though - perhaps not as excellent as you might imagine.

171.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
171.text: You see, when one cult leader is ousted, all that does is leave a vacuum for the next one to step in.

70.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
70.text: My best guess says it's whoever runs the tribunal - a Bhaalist ritual of initiation. It's all Dolor could talk about.

180.speaker: Player
180.text: Let me guess - you want me to investigate.

66.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
66.text: If it were up to me, I'd have every Fist in the city on this.

173.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
173.text: The dwarf mentioned somewhere called 'Candulhallow's Tombstones'. But I can't even look into it... not without getting fired.

192.speaker: Player
192.text: Where can I find this tribunal?

240.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
240.text: The dwarf mentioned somewhere called 'Candulhallow's Tombstones'.

198.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
198.text: I would look into it myself... if it wouldn't get me fired.

216.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
216.text: You see, I already reported this to my superiors, but they wouldn't have any of it.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: You need to put a stop to this.

125.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
125.text: Oh believe me, I would love to. If it wouldn't get me fired.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: The vacuum has already been filled - I am Bhaal's new Chosen.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: I'm one of the killers trying to become an Unholy Assassin.

144.speaker: Player
144.text: I'm just a civilian. Forget I said anything.

184.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
184.text: You're a terrible liar. You've got something. Give it here.

9.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
9.text: You're a terrible liar. You've got something. Give it here.

11.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
11.text: You're a terrible liar. Tell me everything - now.

153.speaker: Narrator
153.text: *Begrudgingly, you tell her about the murder target list you found.*

135.text: Shame. I really thought you might... have something. But you're right, civilians shouldn't be involved in crime scenes.

197.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
197.text: Shame. I really thought you might... have something. But you're right, civilians shouldn't be involved in crime scenes.

19.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
19.text: Now if you don't mind, I've an autopsy to request, and a family to inform.

206.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
206.text: Though you did save my life. So - thanks.

260.speaker: Player
260.text: Tell me what you know. You owe me - I just saved your life.
260.context: NodeContext: weary - she's seen this shit before

200.speaker: Player
200.text: Tell me what you heard or the next murder victim will be you.
200.context: NodeContext: weary - she's seen this shit before

162.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
162.text: If I had a coin for every time a civilian threatened me...
162.context: NodeContext: weary - she's seen this shit before

137.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
137.text: If I had a coin for every time a civilian threatened me...
137.context: NodeContext: weary - she's seen this shit before

234.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
234.text: You've seen those gruesome dioramas that have been springing up, right? Corpses posed like unholy paintings, blood everywhere...

264.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
264.text: There's no way in the hells that those scenes and these murders aren't connected, and I think I know what the connection is.

165.text: Listen, I'm grateful that you saved my life. But you really shouldn't have had to. It's my job to keep you safe, not the other way around. Now if you don't mind, I'd like to get back to it.

258.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
258.text: Listen, I'm grateful that you saved my life. But you really shouldn't have had to. It's my job to keep you safe, not the other way around. Now if you don't mind, I'd like to get back to it.

242.speaker: Player
242.text: Good thing I was here to save you, then.

48.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
48.text: As if I didn't have enough reason to thank you already.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: Awful. I'm sure you've a lot of paperwork to do. I'll leave you to it.

39.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
39.text: Wait! I think you'll want to hear what I have to say.

8.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
8.text: You're not wrong there. Never thought I'd have my life saved by a civilian - thank you.

170.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
170.text: And Figaro... I'll let the family know.

261.speaker: Player
261.text: I wasn't going to let Dolor kill you. Your life is mine.

120.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
120.text: So this is Bhaal's cruelty... I underestimated it.

60.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
60.text: I can't believe I'm glad to see a Bhaalspawn, but gods, I knew you'd be the one to stop this.

80.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
80.text: I should've known it would be you. Thank you.

219.speaker: Gauntlet Devella Fountainhead
219.text: I don't know who you are, but I'm glad you were there.
